Articles.Content:
I can not remove BDArmory, I am trying to change it to BDArmory continued. Please note that I am not experienced with CKAN. It says AD. I removed all dependant mods, but to no avail.

Sorted. I realized that I probably should have asked on the CKAN forum. Sorry!
Sounds like you have a BDArmory.dll file somewhere under your GameData folder. Your operating system should have an option to search for files within a folder; I'd recommend trying that.
